title: The prescience of John Norman
author: VD
content_html:
I may be the only one to find a degree of humor in sex slavery:

Marlena, aged 32, has worked as a prostitute in Lithuania, Russia, Germany and Slovenia for about 7 years. This is her story. After graduating from the University she worked as a teacher of Music. She calculated that it would take her 25 years to collect money for buying her own apartment under the condition she would save every coin. She was thinking that marrying a wealthy man could improve the situation, but no wealthy man appeared.

Finally she met a young man called Roman. He told Marlena, that his job is assisting people in their employment abroad. Marlena knew that Roman’s mother worked in Spain as a house maid and earned 500$ monthly having full board and lodging. Roman promised Marlena to find her a job at a farm close to the place where his mother worked. He asked for just 150$ for his assistance. Marlena believed him. She did not pay attention to the absence of labour contract. She knew that her employment would be illegal so she was not surprised when she saw a German visa in her passport. Marlena was promised the salary of 600$. She took a plane to Frankfurt where she was met by Dmitriy, Roman’s partner. There her problems started.

What’s fascinating is the way in which that slavery is making a global comeback, not just in Africa and Asia, but in the very Eastern European countries from which the term “slave” originated. And it’s particularly ironic to see how college-educated Western feminists who insist that they are equal to men in every way are finding themselves to be completely helpless in the face of the barbarism they have worked so hard to advance. Such a surprise!

If American women choose to reject Judeo-Christian tradition, they will eventually find themselves facing the brothel or the burqah, just as their college-educated sisters in Europe are learning now. And if you think that this bizarre future is impossible, do keep in mind that the USA is only 40-50 years behind Europe in trending towards a post-Christian culture.

Women don’t seem to realize that many of the evils they currently lament is the result of a society that has changed already. I note that a 71″ plasma goes for about 20 times more than a college-educated white woman these days. Clearly this is an outrage that all men of good will must join together and address, as it’s inexcusable that an entertainment necessity should cost so much.

As for the sex slavery, if feminists are so concerned about it, then let them end it. It’s not a problem for men and we have been reliably informed that feminists need us the way a fish needs a bicycle. Only one guess as to what the female solution to sex slavery is, since it’s the same nebulous one they propose for everything from acquaintance rape to wage inequities: “The society should change its attitude….”

Right, good luck with that.
